results.title: Metformin rescues rapamycin-induced mitochondrial dysfunction and attenuates rheumatoid arthritis with metabolic syndrome
results.text_hl: Thus, @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ attenuated Th17/Treg imbalance in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Experimental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001169 @@@CIA@@@.

results.title: Combination of LMT-28 and Metformin Improves Beneficial Anti-Inflammatory Effect in Collagen-Induced Arthritis.
results.text_hl: This study aimed to investigate the anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effect and mechanism of a combination of @CHEMICAL_LMT_28 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000600815 @@@LMT-28@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in a @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Experimental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001169 @@@CIA@@@ model.

results.title: Suppression of experimental arthritis through AMP-activated protein kinase activation and autophagy modulation.
results.text_hl: Induction of autophagic flux, through @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-mediated @GENE_PRKAA1 @GENE_5562 @@@AMP-activated protein kinase@@@ (@GENE_PRKAA1 @GENE_5562 @@@AMPK@@@) activation and interruption of @GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mammalian target of rapamycin@@@ (@GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@) signaling mitigated the @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Experimental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001169 @@@experimental arthritis@@@.

results.title: Metformin downregulates Th17 cells differentiation and attenuates murine autoimmune arthritis.
results.text_hl: Splenocytes from @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Experimental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001169 @@@CAIA@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ differentiated less readily into Th17 cells upon ex vivo stimulation.

results.title: Metformin ameliorates experimental-obesity-associated autoimmune arthritis by inducing FGF21 expression and brown adipocyte differentiation
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ was administered daily for 13 weeks to @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Experimental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001169 @@@CIA@@@ that had been fed a high-fat diet.

results.title: Combination therapy with metformin and coenzyme Q10 in murine experimental autoimmune arthritis.
results.text_hl: These findings suggest that the combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ and @CHEMICAL_coenzyme_Q10 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C024989 @@@CoQ10@@@ reduced @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Experimental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001169 @@@CIA@@@ severity, improving @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial dysfunction@@@ compared to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ or @CHEMICAL_coenzyme_Q10 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C024989 @@@CoQ10@@@ alone.

citations.NLM: Jhun J, Lee S, Kim SY, Na HS, Kim EK, Kim JK, Jeong JH, Park SH, Cho ML. Combination therapy with metformin and coenzyme Q10 in murine experimental autoimmune arthritis. Immunopharmacol Immunotoxicol. 2016;38(2):103-12. PMID: 26681425
